text:
FWIW,

In the Requirements section - Accurate time keeping paragraph - The NTP homepage
is given as http://www.eecis.udel.edu/~ntp/.  The ntp.org web-site has moved and
is now located at http://www.ntp.org. As of 26 May 2003.

Thanks,

Bob
creator: rchaskell@earthlink.net
